name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 姫石榴
summary:
ゴスロリ愛好家の集まるオフ会で、
自分の衣装を自画自賛している
自信過剰な彼女を少し懲らしめてやろう・・・
--
girl in "gothic & Lolita" enthusiast official exhibition is self-praising on her own dressing. Let's try to punish the self-confident cutie a little bit,shon't we?

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
You can also use your finger to make her do as you wish!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
